item.title: Bar fridge - dumped on pavement opposite Walton Housr, 27th November
item.description:
The fridge probably comes from The Gallery pub, but I guess the landlord doesn’t care about the local community….it has been there for more than a week, perhaps he is hoping someone will take it for scrap?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aylesford Street, Pimlico, City of Westminster

item.title: Plate on street light lying on ground, 27th November
item.description:

item.title: Smashed traffic light, 27th November
item.description:
I couldn’t see this had been reported but just in case, someone has driven in to traffic light and the whole pole is lying on ground. Fortunately there are other traffic lights working but please send engineer to replace.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vassall Road, Loughborough Junction, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Damage - pole leaning / equipment detached from pole/facing the wrong direction

item.title: Ev charger broken, 27th November
item.description:
Ev charger has been broken for months- there is a shortage in the borough, majority of which are tied to parking permits making it impossible to go elsewhere. Please get this fixed as Streatham hill east needs this provision and it’s unacceptable to leave it is his way for this long.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cricklade Avenue, Streatham Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
